name: Annales Theosophiques (IAPSOP)
content:
Annales Theosophiques (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Annales Theosophiques Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Annales Theosophiques. 1908-1916? Quarterly Paris, France. Language: French. Editor: Gaston Revel, founder and editor. 1/1, March 1909-1916(?) The last surviving issue is April-June 1914, but the journal was still being advertised in Lotus Bleu in August 1916. Gaston Revel founded and edited this and other small Theosophical journals, and also edited La Revue Theosophique / Le Lotus Bleu from 1914 to 1919. BNF; Societe Theosophique de France. Issues:Annales Theosophiques 1Tri 1908 Annales Theosophiques 2Tri 1908 Annales Theosophiques 3Tri 1908 Annales Theosophiques 4Tri 1908 Annales Theosophiques 2Tri 1909 Annales Theosophiques 3Tri 1909 Annales Theosophiques 4Tri 1909
